# Pull Request

Thank you for contributing to the HawkSearch developer community! 🚀  
Please complete the sections below to help us review your contribution efficiently.

---

## Summary

**What does this PR do?**

Provide a brief, clear description of the change and the problem it solves.

Explain the use case or scenario this contribution addresses.

## Testing & Validation

Please describe how this was tested:

- [ ] Local testing

Include any steps reviewers can follow to validate the change.

## Security & Privacy Checklist

- [ ] No API keys, credentials, or secrets included
- [ ] Uses only publicly documented HawkSearch APIs
- [ ] Does not include proprietary or internal HawkSearch code
- [ ] Sample data is safe to publish

## Support Level

Please select the appropriate label (maintainers may adjust):

- [ ] Official example (maintained by HawkSearch)
- [ ] Community example
- [ ] Experimental / reference only

Anything else reviewers should know? Tradeoffs, limitations, or follow-up ideas?

- [ ] I have read the CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] My code follows repository style guidelines
